recommended_degree: Administrasi Bisnis, Analis Farmasi, Administrasi Bisnis Terapan, Bio Medis dan Rekayasa Hayati, Rekayasa Hayati (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:

* Prepare draft reports, worksheets, validation logs, and other related technical documents.
* Ensure accuracy, clarity, and compliance in all documentation.
* Support ongoing projects by coordinating tasks, preparing materials, and maintaining project timelines.
* Assist with data collection, data analysis, and preparing presentations or reports for project meetings.
* Communicate effectively with project team members to ensure smooth workflow.
* Contribute to activities that enhance the companyâ€™s external presence.
